message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can seal the deal!
I'll give you a decent amount, but I'm not going for a 75/25 split. Meet me in the middle!
Meet me in the middle, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than last time.
You're getting closer, but I think I can do better. I'll give you 40% and take the rest.
I'm not afraid to walk away, Bob. I think I deserve a bigger share. Meet me at 60/40!
I'm not going to give you the majority, but I'll give you a bit more than last time. Take it or leave it.
I'm not backing down, Bob. I think I deserve a bigger share. Meet me at 55/45!
I'm not budging, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it.
I'm not afraid of a 50/50 split, Bob. Let's call it a draw and walk away with equal shares.
